name: NSCreateCommand
desc: A command that creates a scriptable object.

items.name: var createClassDescription: NSScriptClassDescription
items.desc: Returns the class description for the class that is to be created.

items.name: var resolvedKeyDictionary: [String : Any]
items.desc: Returns a dictionary that contains the properties that were specified in the make Apple event command that has been converted to this NSCreateCommand object.
